title: Noah Goodhart
text: Hello there! My name is Noah Goodhart and I am currently a senior in the Ecosystem Science and Sustainability major at Colorado State University. I am a Colorado native, and in my free time I love to ski and fly kites. I want to pursue a career in sustainability or hydrology ideally at a ski resort in Colorado, because skiing was such an integral part of my upbringing, and I want to make sure future generations have the same opportunity.

title: CSU Projects
text:
In the Spring of 2025 I took a class Quantative Reasoning class based in R. I wrote some code, and did some cool data science. Here is a collection of links!
Visit My Quarto Website
In this project, I learned the basics of building a Quarto website. Tasks I learned included committing and pushing edits, navigating GitHub, creating new .qmd files to add to my website, creating links, uploading pdfs, correcting my YAML formatting, and editting my .yml file to change the cosmetics of my website.
